mcq.statement: Choose the correct punctuated sentence: Aftab’s colleagues were uncooperative, so his father went round to have a word., Aftab’s colleagues were uncooperative; so his father went round to have a word., Aftab’s colleagues were uncooperative: so his father went round to have a word., None of these.

options.a: Aftab’s colleagues were uncooperative, so his father went round to have a word.
options.b: Aftab’s colleagues were uncooperative; so his father went round to have a word.
options.c: Aftab’s colleagues were uncooperative: so his father went round to have a word.
